items.summary: Add the uploaded image file "MauiLaneCareHome-4.jpg" to the frontend static assets so it is served reliably in IC deployments (place it under frontend/public/assets/generated/).

Update the branding configuration so the global logo path points to "assets/generated/MauiLaneCareHome-4.jpg" (replacing the current logo path) so BrandLogo renders this uploaded image everywhere it is used.

Ensure the login/sign-in screen (ProtectedGate) and the authenticated header (MauiAppShell) display the uploaded logo image via the existing BrandLogo component, without regressions to sizing or fallback behavior.
